relationships.description: Zubair is providing election analysis data to Jeffrey

analysis.purpose: To provide statistical analysis of Twitter sentiment and election predictions following the second presidential debate
analysis.significance: Shows interest in real-time political analysis and data tracking during the 2016 presidential election

notable_quotes: Since the start of 2nd US Presidential Election debate till now, we have processed 3.1 million tweets.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - appears to be straightforward data reporting

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is legitimate political analysis data

public_knowledge.context: Election polling and social media sentiment analysis were widely reported during the 2016 presidential campaign

analysis.summary: Zubair Khan emails Jeffrey E. with Twitter sentiment analysis and election predictions following the second 2016 presidential debate, showing Clinton with significantly more positive sentiment (40.70% vs Trump's 11.80%) and a 72% chance of winning according to their analysis.
